Posts.Content: Jul 24, 2011 08:08AM sallyz wrote: Sally, I had the genetic testing about 7 years ago and am BRCA II positive.  I have other family members that had it done as well and two of those that were positive like me had the preventative surgery.  I had intended to but kept telling myself that I would do it as soon as I lost the weight.  Now I am angry as the choice has been made for me and in another month I am scheduled for bilater mx with reconstruction.  The genetic testing is a tool and it is up to your family whether they continue with it if you are positive.  You may be negative-it happens.  :)  I too am sick of thinking about it and answering questions and want to do this now.  Sometimes I can't believe how angry I am but I am fortunate as I have wonderful friends and family to help.  When I tell them I'm tired of thinking about it, they move on.  I say run that marathon; you do that for you...right?  Hugs!
Posts.Title: just diagnosed yesterday.... MustangSally67 Jen42
